title: Amore More
overview: At the center of the story are two couples of young people with relationship difficulties. Poliamor George does not know how to explain to his new beloved Alice that she will never be his only one. The marriage of another couple - chef Sergey and accountant Elena - is bursting at the seams: after the pandemic, Sergey's business collapsed, he fell into a deep depression and wants - literally - nothing. George proposes a plan to his wife Elena: together they open a bar called AMORE MORE, where they will hold parties for couples. Sergey will return to work, Alice will be able to reconsider her attitude towards polyamory. But the plan collapses - real feelings interfere in the matter ...
